resources.string: Cannot process. Please send the text.
Cannot process. PlantUML server doesn\'t work.
Cannot process. Please insert SD card.
Cannot process. Please connect to Internet.
Cannot process. Please open the image.

1. Create PlantUML file in your favorite text editor. 
2. Send or open the file with PlantUML application. 
3. Wait text to be send to PlantUML site and the resulting image to be downloaded to temp folder. 
4. Preview the resulting image. 
5. Send or open the image in an image editor or to a document or cloud.
Enter your PlantUML server location, including full path to an \'img\' servlet.
Cannot process. PlantUML server address is wrong.
